articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT wolovim.eth
last week to apply for the @EFDevcon scholars program -- scholars receive a conf ticket + travel/lodging/etc. funding!
⚡️ apply by Aug 1 ⚡️
Deva the Devcon Unicorn: Announcing the Devcon VI Scholars Program & Devcon Week! 🎉
If your attendance in Devcon could impact Ethereum, and you’re otherwise not able to attend due to cost, please apply for the Scholars Program by August 1st!
Read more and meet Devcon WEEK here:
 https://blog.ethereum.org/2022/07/20/devcon-scholars-returns-22/

articles.description:
